record.title: Artificial intelligence-driven translational medicine: a machine learning framework for predicting disease outcomes and optimizing patient-centric care.
record.subjects: Machine Learning ; Artificial Intelligence ; Translational Research, Biomedical ; Patient-Centered Care ; Translational Science, Biomedical methods ; Humans ; Neural Networks, Computer ; Treatment Outcome
record.abstract: Declarations. Ethics approval and consent to participate: This article does not contain any studies with human participants or animals performed by any of the authors. Competing interests: The authors declare no competing interests.
record.contributors: Abualigah, Laith ; Alomari, Saleh Ali ; Almomani, Mohammad H ; Zitar, Raed Abu ; Saleem, Kashif ; Migdady, Hazem ; Snasel, Vaclav ; Smerat, Aseel ; Ezugwu, Absalom E
